li.p:
Open Source 1 MCCB and lock OFF:
Open (turn OFF) Source 1 MCCB.
Lock Source 1: Turn S1 key to extend locking bar.
Source 1 is now disabled, but Source 2 is active.
Remove S1 key from Source 1 lock.
Insert S1 key in S1 key position in dead-front panel Kirk-Key blocks.

Close Bypass Source 2:
Turn Bypass S2 key to extend bar and lock Kirk Keys in dead-front panel. (Extending the locking bar prevents removing the Bypass S1 key, preventing bypass cross-connect.)
Remove Bypass S2 key from dead-front panel lock.
Insert Bypass S2 key into Bypass Source 2 MCCB lock.
Unlock Bypass Source 2 MCCB, moving blocking bar to the right.
Close (Turn ON) MCCB Bypass Source 2.

Open Source 2 MCCB:
Open (turn OFF) S2 MCCB.
Turn S2 key to lock MCCB open.
Remove S2 key and move it to S2 key position in top left dead-front key block.
Open (turn OFF) Isolation MCCBs or MCSWs. (There may be one or two Isolation MCCBs or MCSWs.)
